title: A(DODO)MISSION
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt darkmode=a|hidetitle=a]]

[[module CSS]]
body {
background: black;
}

hr {
background: transparent;
border-top: double 3px var(--accentColor);
    filter: brightness(300%);
}

.notation hr, .jotting hr, .darkdocument hr, .modal hr, .smallmodal hr, div.blockquote hr, .blockquote hr, blockquote hr {
border-top: solid 2px grey;
}

#side-bar {
    background: linear-gradient(
0deg
 , rgba(10, 10, 10, 1) 87%, var(--accentColor) 100%);
}

a {
    font-weight: 600;
}

a.newpage {
    font-weight: 600;
}

a:visited {
    font-weight: 600;
}

#side-bar .side-block {
    background: linear-gradient(
180deg
, rgba(10, 10, 10, 1) 0%, var(--accentColor) 100%);
border: solid 2px var(--accentColor);
}

#side-bar .side-block.resources {
    background: var(--accentColor);
}

#side-bar .side-block.media {
    background-color: var(--accentColor) !important;
    border-bottom: solid 2px var(--accentColor);
    border-top: solid 2px var(--accentColor);
}

::selection {
    background-color: rgba(242, 242, 242, 1);
    color: black;
}

.footer-wikiwalk-nav a {
    color: var(--accentColor);
}

:root {
    --title: "A(DODO)MISSION";
    --subtitle: "HELP, IM STUCK IN THE WELL!";
    --accentColor: hsl(0, 0%, 0%);
    --accentColor2: hsl(0, 0%, 20%);
    --sidesubtitle: "HELP, IM STUCK IN THE WELL";
    --logo: url(http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/collab%3Astop-collaborate-and-listen/Dodo-bw.png);

}
#side-bar > div.side-block.media img {
    filter: none !important;
    -webkit-filter: none !important;
}

.custom2 .wiki-content-table {
    width: 100%;
}

#page-content tr th {
    text-align: center;
}

.fnnum::after, .fnnum:hover::after {
    color: #b8f !important;
}

#main-content {
max-width: 95%;
}

#content-wrap {
    margin: 0 0 0 0 !important;
    min-width: 100%;
}

#page-content .page-rate-widget-box .rate-points, #page-content .page-rate-widget-box .rateup, #page-content .page-rate-widget-box .ratedown, #page-content .page-rate-widget-box .cancel {
    background-color: #000000 !important;
}

hr {
border-top: double 4px #333333;
}

#extra-div-1 {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
}
[[/module]]

[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block
name=http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/collab%3Astop-collaborate-and-listen/Dodo-bw.png
|caption=A(DODO)Mission
|width=100%
|align=center]]
[[/div]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[=]]
+ [[span style="letter-spacing: unset;"]]A(DODO)MISSION[[/span]]

[[div style="opacity: 80%;"]]
[[size 90%]]**(n.)** a series of artworks by a felted whale.[[/size]]
[[/div]]

= //To depict everything is to depict nothing; as one's canvas increases, so too is their paint stretched thin.//
----
[[tabview]]
[[tab TERMINATION ATTEMPT]]
[[=image TERMA-S.jpg width="600px"]]
+ __SCP-6820: TERMINATION ATTEMPT__
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6820 > LINK <]
@@ @@
